name: Red Scare Chapter 2
description:
This game is free to download.

TRIGGER WARNING: THIS GAME CONTAINS SEMI-GRAPHIC VIOLENCE SO PLEASE ME AWARE.

A overzealous leader and his army are running their already shitty army to the ground. This is the first episode of a RPG/Visual novel story.  The story was originally written by 6 friends and now we are ready to share it with you. Stay tune for more characters, more conflicts, serious and fun decisions.

Art: Damian tdc, Francisco Ruiz, Fernanda Ramirez, Alex

Writing: Damian tdc, Alex, Ray Rosales
